CN.content:
Please identify the "Material Name" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: 27 On the basis of this new building block , we designed and synthesized a series of conjugated copolymers : unit 8 coupled with electron - rich unit benzo[1,2b:4,5-b 0 ]dithiophene ( P1 and P2 ) or with electron - deficient unit 2,2 0 -bithiazole ( P3 and P4 ) or benzo [c] [1,2,5]thiadiazole ( P5 ) and homopolymer ( P6 ) ( Figure 2 ).

Let's think step by step.

| Material Name |
|--------------|
| conjugated copolymers |
| unit 8 |
| electron - rich unit benzo[1,2b:4,5-b 0 ]dithiophene (P1) |
| electron - rich unit benzo[1,2b:4,5-b 0 ]dithiophene (P2) |
| electron - deficient unit 2,2 0 -bithiazole (P3) |
| electron - deficient unit 2,2 0 -bithiazole (P4) |
| electron - deficient unit benzo [c] [1,2,5]thiadiazole (P5) |
| homopolymer (P6) |

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Material name" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Material Name |
|--------------|
| conjugated copolymers |
| unit 8 |
| electron - rich unit benzo[1,2b:4,5-b 0 ]dithiophene (P1) |
| electron - rich unit benzo[1,2b:4,5-b 0 ]dithiophene (P2) |
| electron - deficient unit 2,2 0 -bithiazole (P3) |
| electron - deficient unit 2,2 0 -bithiazole (P4) |
| electron - deficient unit benzo [c] [1,2,5]thiadiazole (P5) |

These entities are clearly material names as they refer to specific types of copolymers and homopolymers with distinct structural units.
